Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package multus is earlier than 4.0.2-8, affected by CVE-2025-22872
